00010 #ifndef BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_REF_FUSION_NTH_RESULT_OF_ER_2010_HPP
00011 #define BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_REF_FUSION_NTH_RESULT_OF_ER_2010_HPP
00012 #include <boost/mpl/void.hpp>
00013 #include <boost/mpl/vector.hpp>
00014 #include <boost/mpl/fold.hpp>
00015 #include <boost/mpl/placeholders.hpp>
00016 #include <boost/mpl/eval_if.hpp>
00017 #include <boost/mpl/identity.hpp>
00018 #include <boost/type_traits/is_same.hpp>
00019 #include <boost/assign/v2/ref/wrapper/deduce_assign_tag.hpp>
00020 #include <boost/assign/v2/ref/fusion/fwd.hpp>
00021 #include <boost/assign/v2/ref/fusion/root.hpp>
00022 #include <boost/assign/v2/ref/fusion/nil_arg.hpp>
00023 
00024 namespace boost{
00025         struct use_default;
00026 namespace assign{
00027 namespace v2{
00028 namespace ref{
00029 namespace fusion_aux{
00030 
00031         template<typename Tag1, typename Tag2, typename Tnil>
00032     struct empty
00033     {
00034         typedef fusion_aux::container<
00035                 0,
00036             typename fusion_aux::root_type,
00037             Tag1,
00038             Tag2, 
00039             Tnil
00040         > type;
00041     };
00042 
00043     template<typename Tag1, typename Tag2, typename Tnil>
00044         struct nth_result
00045     {
00046 
00047                 typedef typename
00048                 fusion_aux::empty<Tag1, Tag2, Tnil>::type state_;
00049 
00050                 template<typename State, typename T>
00051         struct result : State::template result<T>{};
00052 
00053                 template<typename Vec>
00054         struct apply : boost::mpl::fold<
00055                 Vec,
00056             state_,
00057             result<boost::mpl::_1, boost::mpl::_2>
00058         >{};
00059 
00060         };
00061 
00062 }// fusion_aux
00063 namespace nth_result_of{
00064 
00065         template<
00066         typename Tag1, typename Tag2, typename Tnil = fusion_aux::nil_arg_type
00067     >
00068         struct fusion
00069     {
00070         template<typename Vec>
00071         struct apply : boost::mpl::apply1<
00072                 fusion_aux::nth_result<Tag1, Tag2, Tnil>,
00073                 Vec
00074         >{};
00075         };
00076 
00077 }// nth_result_of
00078 }// ref
00079 }// v2
00080 }// assign
00081 }// boost
00082 
00083 #endif
